sent.orig: Commission personnel examination is advanced examination, average examination and particular kind examination mark.
sent.trans: 任命人员考试又分为高等考试、普通考试和特种考试。

sent.orig: Selective examination for quality supervision of medical devices selective examination and supervision-centric selective examination.
sent.trans: 评价性抽验是指为掌握、了解医疗器械总体质量状况所进行的抽验。

sent.orig: After an examination, many students were chatting away merrily and turning examination hall into a market.
sent.trans: 一次考试完毕后，许多学生在考场交头接耳，大声喧哗。

sent.orig: Now, I'll do a rectal examination for you to take the prostatic secretion for microscopec examination.
sent.trans: 现在我给你做一个肛门检查，取点前列腺分泌液在显微镜下检查。

sent.orig: Breast examination: Principles of examination are similar for physician and patient.
sent.trans: 乳房检查：医生检查和病人自己检查的原则类似。
